<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Rapid Adaptation](/Spells.aspx?ID=979)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** your [companion](/animal-companions) or [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You flood the target with energy from the terrain around it, compressing centuries of evolution into a single moment. The target gains one of the following natural adaptations based on the surrounding environment.

- **Aquatic** The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.
- **Arctic** The target isn't affected by [severe or extreme cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642), and when it rolls a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on ice and snow, it gets a critical success instead.
- **Desert** The target isn't affected by severe or extreme heat, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sand, it gets a critical success instead.
- **Forest** The target gains [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) with a range of 30 feet.
- **Mountain** The target isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) when [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, it gets a critical success instead.
- **Plains** The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to its land Speed.
- **Underground** The target gains [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Rapid Adaptation
